{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal">
  <fieldset>

    <div id="legend" class="">
      <legend class="">Application backup schemes</legend>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Select Multiple</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <select class="input-xlarge" multiple="multiple">
          <option>Every 5 minutes for last hour</option>
          <option>Every 15 minutes for last hour</option>
          <option>Every hour for last 24 hours</option>
          <option>Every day for last week</option>
          <option>Every week for last month</option>
          <option>Last 3 months</option>
          <option>Last 6 months</option>
          <option>Last 9 months</option>
          <option>Last year</option>
          <option></option></select>
       </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label"></label>
      <div class="controls">
        <button class="btn btn-success" name="save">Save</button>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div id="legend" class="">
      <legend class="">Monitoring</legend>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Check every</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <label class="radio">        <input type="radio" value="1 Minute" name="group" checked="checked">1 Minute      </label>
        <label class="radio">        <input type="radio" value="5 Minutes" name="group">5 Minutes      </label>
        <label class="radio">        <input type="radio" value="10 Minutes" name="group">10 Minutes      </label>
        <label class="radio">        <input type="radio" value="30 Minutes" name="group">30 Minutes      </label>
        <label class="radio">        <input type="radio" value="Hour" name="group">Hour      </label>
        <label class="radio">        <input type="radio" value="Day" name="group">Day      </label>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Alarm types</label>
        <div class="controls">
          <label class="checkbox">        <input type="checkbox" value="Emergency">Emergency      </label>
          <label class="checkbox">        <input type="checkbox" value="Alert">        Alert      </label>
          <label class="checkbox">        <input type="checkbox" value="Critical">        Critical      </label>
          <label class="checkbox">        <input type="checkbox" value="Error">        Error      </label>
          <label class="checkbox">        <input type="checkbox" value="Warning">        Warning      </label>
          <label class="checkbox">        <input type="checkbox" value="Notice">        Notice      </label>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
          <label class="control-label" for="input01">Additional E-mail Warning Address</label>
          <div class="controls">
            <input type="text" placeholder="$$adminemail" class="input-xlarge">
            <p class="help-block">Comma Separated List Of Email Destinations For Escalation</p>
          </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Escalate To Administrator</label>
      <div class="controls">
      <label class="checkbox">
        <input type="checkbox" value="Yes">
        Yes
      </label>
      </div>

    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Log All Events</label>
      <div class="controls">
      <label class="checkbox">
        <input type="checkbox" value="Yes">
        Yes
      </label>
    </div>

    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Log Retention</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <select class="input-xlarge">
        <option>1 day</option>
        <option>1 week</option>
        <option>1 month</option>
        <option>6 months</option>
        <option>1 year</option></select>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label"></label>
      <div class="controls">
        <button class="btn btn-success" name="save">Save</button>
      </div>
    </div>

  </fieldset>
</form>

}}
